channel.title: Post on Anton S.
channel.description: Recent content in Post on Anton S.

item.title: IBM at U of T Conference
item.description: On April 18, I had the chance to attend the U of T IBM Quantum Computing Conference along with other MSRG members.

item.title: This website
item.description: This webpage was set up using HUGO, a static site generator, using the Lowkey theme. With the static site generator, adding content amounts to changing a markdown file, then CSS is generated by the theme’s template.
